author: Christian Wait
description: As of September 16, Dragon Quest VII Reimagined is up for preorder on Switch, PS5, and Xbox. Amazon also has deals on Lisen USB-C cables ($5.30), INIU’s 20,000mAh portable charger ($35.98), the Charlie Brown Christmas Zoetrope vinyl ($32.99), and the Lexar 512GB Play PRO microSD Express card ($119.99).

description: Supergirl is set to fly into theaters on June 26, 2026, and we thought it was time to start gathering all the cast and characters who will be joining Milly Alcock in the next big film from the DCU following Superman!
title: Supergirl Cast and Characters: Who's Confirmed for the DCU Movie?

description: Say goodbye to buying compressed air canisters in bulk.

description: Superman launches on HBO Max on September 19, Warner Bros. has announced. The DC Universe kickstarter arrives on the streamer just over two months after it hit theaters in July and with $615 million at the global box office under its belt.
title: Superman HBO Max Release Date Confirmed After $615 Million at the Global Box Office

author: Michael Peyton
description: The non-stop show will be filled with tons of game announcements, trailers, celebrity interviews, and exclusive reveals.
title: IGN Fan Fest Returns With a Special Fall Edition Featuring Keanu Reeves, Dispatch, Splinter Cell: Deathwatch, and More

author: Tom Phillips
description: Days of Our Lives' current 61st season has included a shoutout for one of Nintendo's lesser-known franchises, much to the surprise of fans.

description: The beloved Central Perk coffeehouse from the iconic 90s sitcom Friends is becoming a reality, with a permanent location coming to Manhattan this fall.

description: Dark Horse is bringing its award-winning manga adaptation of Star Wars: A New Hope back to print, and we've got an exclusive preview of the gorgeous artwork.

author: Tom Phillips
description: Marvel's upcoming The Fantastic Four: First Steps Blu-ray will feature five deleted scenes, with at least one seemingly centered on Mole Man.

description: The Long Walk is getting an Amazon exclusive 4K steelbook that's now available to preorder for $34.99. It does not have a release date yet.

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Big news for Batman fans: writer-director Matt Reeves has, in fact, delivered a new script for his sequel film The Batman: Part II — but it wasn’t necessarily an easy road for the filmmaker to get to this point.
title: Matt Reeves Says The Batman: Part 2 Is 'A Journey That Is Taking Longer Than I Would’ve Wanted for a Lot of Reasons' — but the Script Is Worth the Wait

description: If you haven't already played Bioshock, you should.
title: How to Play the BioShock Games in Chronological Order

description: The latest PS5 system update will finally allow your DualSense controller to pair across multiple devices without having to de- and re-pair every time you switch.
title: Latest PS5 System Update Lets You Connect Your DualSense Controller To Multiple Devices At Once

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: Funko is celebrating 15 years of DC figures with a new wave of NYCC exclusives. Find out which heroes and villains are included and how you can buy them.
title: Funko Celebrates 15 Years of DC Pop! Figures at NYCC 2025

author: Jim Vejvoda
description: Splinter Cell: Deathwatch showrunner Derek Kolstad told IGN: "With an adaptation, especially when it's the first time in this medium, you have to rip the spine out of the source material, Keep the brain and the heart, entertain the soul, and do your best to actually build it into something that works.”
title: Splinter Cell: Deathwatch - Exclusive Trailer for the Netflix Animated Series

author: Callum Williams
description: A complete timeline of Shin Megami Tensei's most beloved spin-off.
title: Every Persona Game and Spin-Off in Order

author: Tom Phillips
description: Alex Hernandez, the actor who provided the performance and likeness of MindsEye's main character, has shared his thoughts on the game's negative reception — and said he initially thought he would "never work in a game again" after starring on its front cover.
title: MindsEye Actor Says Awful Launch Left Him Wondering if He'd Ever Work in Games Again: 'Do I Have the Opposite of the Golden Touch, The S***-Brown Touch?'

author: Vikki Blake
description: The Megalodon is coming to Jurassic World Evolution 3. Check out a first look.
title: The Megalodon Comes to Jurassic World Evolution 3 — Just Don't Try Punching It in the Face

description: Here's how to watch the Resident Evil movies in order, both chronologically and by release date.

author: Vikki Blake
description: Hollow Knight: Silksong developer Team Cherry has released patch notes for the game's second post-launch update.
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Developer Team Cherry Releases Patch Notes for Second Post-Launch Update

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Dispatch, the upcoming workplace superhero comedy adventure game with a strategy layer from a group of ex-Telltale developers, is coming to PC and PS5 on October 22. Dispatch stars Aaron Paul and Jeffrey Wright and is developed by AdHoc, a new studio comprised of a number of former Telltale developers. It will be released episodically over the course of four weeks, with two episodes dropping each week starting on October 22. It's priced at $30 for the full season, or $40 for deluxe version of the full season that includes a digital artbook and four digital comics.
title: Dispatch, the Superhero Comedy from Ex-Telltale Devs, Confirms PC + PS5 Release Date and Episodic Release

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: In an exclusive interview, the developers of Nioh 3 at Team Ninja go into detail about the new Ninja Style combat system.
title: How Nioh 3 is Changing the Game with Ninja Style and the Distinctive Mist System – IGN First

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: I think that fans of the puzzle genre will be refreshed by The Lift’s new take on problem-solving. Overall, the execution of the fiddling-and-fixing gameplay is spot-on, and there’s great satisfaction to be had in watching lights flicker on and systems come back online.
title: The Lift Turns Mundane Productivity Into a Clever Puzzle Game

author: Tom Phillips
description: Microsoft has confirmed the Xbox Game Pass September 2025 Wave 1 lineup of titles, which is headlined by beloved indie game Hades.
title: Xbox Game Pass September 2025 Wave 2 Lineup Confirmed — Hades Dominates

author: Tom Phillips
description: Disney has teased the rise of Robert Downey Jr's Doctor Doom with a fresh look at the character's design, superpowers, and a big tease for how he may establish his dominance in Avengers: Doomsday.
title: Doctor Doom Tease Recreates Iconic Thanos Death Moment, Prompting Speculation This is How Avengers: Doomsday Deals With Kang

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Hollywood legend Robert Redford has died aged 89.
title: All the President's Men, Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid Actor Robert Redford Dies Aged 89

description: If the boxing training wasn't giveaway enough, here's our first look at Curtis "50 Cent" Jackson as Balrog in Legendary's upcoming live-action Street Fighter movie… And yes, he's boasting a very distinct hairstyle.

title: Assassin's Creed Shadows: Claws of Awaji DLC Review

author: Tom Phillips
description: Assassin's Creed Shadows' Claws of Awaji DLC, which launches today, kicks off with a surprise side-scrolling intro sequence that's reminiscent of Ubisoft's classic Prince of Persia series, themed around a Japanese puppet show.
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows DLC Includes a Prince of Persia-Style Side-Scrolling Sequence

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Randy Pitchford has continued his social media push to address complaints about the performance of the PC version of Borderlands 4, telling some disgruntled players they can get a Steam refund if they’re unhappy with the game.
title: 'My Advice to Users Is to Accept Reality and Tune, or to Not Play' — Randy Pitchford Is at the 'Get a Refund From Steam' Stage of the Borderlands 4 PC Performance Backlash

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Game of Thrones spinoff A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms will launch on HBO Max in January 2026, Casey Bloys, Chairman and CEO, HBO and HBO Max Content, has confirmed.
title: HBO Max Chief Reveals 2026 Release Months for Game of Thrones Spinoff a Knight of the Seven Kingdoms and House of the Dragon Series 3

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Borderlands 4 players have discovered an infinite damage build so broken it kills bosses in seconds — even on the hardest difficulty levels.
title: 'Abuse It While You Can' — Borderlands 4 Has an Infinite Damage Build So Broken It Kills Bosses in Seconds

author: Tom Phillips
description: Sega has reignited its old rivalry against Nintendo in a spicy trailer for Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds that doesn't hold back on its comparisons with Switch 2 launch title Mario Kart World.
title: Sega Mocks Mario Kart World and its Dull Open World in Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds Trailer

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Pocketpair has said it’s now heads down getting Palworld ready to leave early access and officially release its 1.0 update at some point in 2026.
title: As Nintendo and the Pokémon Company's Patent Lawsuit Rumbles On, Pocketpair Says It's Heads Down Getting Palworld Ready to Exit Early Access and Officially Release Ver 1.0 in 2026

description: Amazon has officially revealed the dates for its next Prime exclusive sale, coming soon in October.
title: Amazon Officially Announces Its October Prime Day Dates for 2025

description: Four platforms, four dangerous rabbit holes, and more cheap ways to sink your free time than you have hours.
